itemLabel: David Evans, Baron Evans of Watford

wikipedia_page.main: David Charles Evans, Baron Evans of Watford (born 30 November 1942) is a British publisher, entrepreneur and philanthropist. As a Member of the House of Lords, he sits as a Labour peer and also holds chairmanships that span across printing, business consultancy, charity and healthcare.

response: * David Evans, Baron Evans of Watford (born 1942), British trade unionist and businessman
